bug.author: ifokeev
bug.description: I was testing new implemented method and was getting response full of probabilities for output feature. I checked the definition and found that outputs are overriding <denchmark-link:https://github.com/uber/ludwig/blob/4039f93e605ed929e4f4a75c725bb70e148df92b/ludwig/models/model.py#L1419-L1430>https://github.com/uber/ludwig/blob/4039f93e605ed929e4f4a75c725bb70e148df92b/ludwig/models/model.py#L1419-L1430</denchmark-link> . Providing PR of the fix.
